## Bio

Welcome to my page! My name is Ray, and I am a full-time student at the University of Michigan Ann Arbor, majoring in Psychology. Meanwhile, I minor in Statistics and Social Class and Inequality Studies.

By browsing the self-built website, you will find more information about my experience, career goals and passions, and thoughts about the project I am working on. You will also view assignments and projects I completed during my studies at UCONN and UMich. I appreciate your interest, and please reach out to me if you have any questions. I hope you enjoy reading over the information on my website as much as I created it for you.
